com.microsoft.azure.sdk.iot.device.transport.amqps

Class AmqpsIotHubConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.qpid.proton.engine.BaseHandler
      • com.microsoft.azure.sdk.iot.device.transport.amqps.AmqpsIotHubConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IotHubTransportConnection, org.apache.qpid.proton.engine.CoreHandler, org.apache.qpid.proton.engine.Handler

    public final class AmqpsIotHubConnection
extends org.apache.qpid.proton.engine.BaseHandler
implements IotHubTransportConnection
    An AMQPS IotHub connection between a device and an IoTHub. This class contains functionality for sending/receiving a message, and logic to re-establish the connection with the IoTHub in case it gets lost.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AmqpsIotHubConnection.ReconnectionTask
      Runnable task to restart the AMQPS connection.

      • open

        public void open(Queue<DeviceClientConfig> deviceClientConfigs)
          throws TransportException
        Opens the AmqpsIotHubConnection.

        This method will start the Reactor, set the connection to open and make it ready for sending.

        Do not call this method after calling close on this object, instead, create a whole new AmqpsIotHubConnection object and open that instead.

        Specified by:
        open in interface IotHubTransportConnection
        Parameters:
        deviceClientConfigs - The list of configs to use. If more than 1 configs are in this list, multiplexing will be used
        Throws:
        TransportException - If the reactor could not be initialized.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws TransportException
        Closes the AmqpsIotHubConnection.

        If the current connection is not closed, this function will set the current state to closed and invalidate all connection related variables.

        Specified by:
        close in interface IotHubTransportConnection
        Throws:
        TransportException - if it failed closing the iothub connection.

      • onLinkRemoteClose

        public void onLinkRemoteClose(org.apache.qpid.proton.engine.Event event)
        Event handler for the link remote close event. This triggers reconnection attempts until successful. Both sender and receiver links closing trigger this event, so we only handle one of them, since the other is redundant.
        Specified by:
        onLinkRemoteClose in interface org.apache.qpid.proton.engine.CoreHandler
        Overrides:
        onLinkRemoteClose in class org.apache.qpid.proton.engine.BaseHandler
        Parameters:
        event - The Proton Event object.

      • getConnectionId

        public String getConnectionId()
        Description copied from interface: IotHubTransportConnection
        Gives the UUID associated with this connection instance. This string is used in conjunction with the callbacks with connection status updates to ensure that all connection status updates are relevant to this connection object
